title: Fountain

verbs: Cause (a liquid) to spatter about, especially with force
To hit or expel liquid at
To cause (a liquid) to spatter about, especially with force.
nouns: One of the temperate seasons
Summer is the warmest of the four temperate seasons, falling between spring and autumn.
The period or season of summer.
One of the four seasons, between Spring and Autumn
The warmest season of the year; in the northern hemisphere it extends from the summer solstice to the autumnal equinox
The time during the summer months.
A fountain is a piece of architecture which pours water into a basin or jets it into the air to supply drinking water and/or for a decorative or dramatic effect.
A structure from which an artificially produced jet of water arises
A stream of water that is forced up into the air through a small hole, especially for decorative effect.
Also spelled fount)
The structure from which an artificial fountain can issue.
Piece of architecture which ejects water
Artificial water feature.
Chemical compound formed of molecules composed of two atoms of hydrogen and one of oxygen

Binary compound that occurs at room temperature as a clear colorless odorless tasteless liquid; freezes into ice below 0 degrees centigrade and boils above 100 degrees centigrade; widely used as a solvent
The liquid form of this chemical; liquid H?O.
Common liquid (H?O) which forms rain, rivers, the sea, etc., and which makes up a large part of the bodies of organisms.
Water is a common chemical substance, that is essential to all known forms of life.
Water is a transparent fluid which forms the world's streams, lakes, oceans and rain, and is the major constituent of the fluids of living things.
Clear liquid H?O.

description: A water fountain, found in a park or other public space. Used for decorative purposes. A variety of styles of fountain are shown across different platforms.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's fountain emoji is a graceful cascade of water, depicted with exquisite detail and Apple's hallmark realistic lighting and smooth gradients. The droplets shimmer with a crystalline clarity, and the overall form exhibits soft rounded edges, giving it a serene and tranquil visual presence on Apple devices. It evokes feelings of peace, refreshment, and the beauty of nature, often used to add a touch of elegance or tranquility to messages.
